message: Hi Bob, I have a great product I think you'll be interested in.  I'm asking $200 for it.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I am interested, but I can only pay up to $120 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $120 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $175.  Let me know if that works for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your price. I am still not able to meet at $175. I am willing to pay up to $150 for the product.
